desc: “B2 Studio” is one of the largest manufacturers of hand-painted glass decor items in Europe. Our specialization is vases of various shapes and candle holders. All decors are applied manually using a large number of techniques. We offer wholesales and dropshipping in USA and EU. Home and interior decoration.

layout.text: Handmade Glass Vases from B2 Studio
We offer modern and classic solutions for home decor
